Description

ManageHotelView

PaydayDiscount
Represents a discount for clients whose booked dates cover the 15th or 30th (excluding check out).

The interface for screens that require a popup for user input.

SelectableHotel
The interface for MVCs that require a selected hotel to work.
Stay4Get1Discount
Represents a discount for clients who booked 5 days or more.

A template for the button visuals seen in the views.

A template for the header labels seen in all screens except the Main Menu View.
